sentences.en: A student should develop in an all - round way - morally, intellectually and physically.
sentences.cn: 学生应该德智体全面发展.

sentences.en: For these people are simply not intellectually capable of abstract reasoning - they can't grasp theories.
sentences.cn: 因为这些人头脑简单,简直难以理喻 -- 他们 根本 接受不了任何理论.

sentences.en: He preferred the company of those who were intellectually inferior to himself.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢与那些智力水平不如他的人共处。

sentences.en: He said so in one of his more offensively intellectually arrogant sentences.
sentences.cn: 他是用一种更加狡猾可恶的傲慢话语说的.

sentences.en: He spent the evening sizing me up intellectually.
sentences.cn: 他整晚都在若有所思地打量我。

sentences.en: Intellectually, I was completely prepared for that type of work.
sentences.cn: 从心智上来说，我已经对那种工作完全作好了准备。

sentences.en: Intellectually, this is a point I grasped long ago.
sentences.cn: 我早就从思想上认识到这一点.

sentences.en: Intellectually, this man and I are worlds apart.
sentences.cn: 在智力上，我和这个男子有天壤之别。

sentences.en: Leading scientists claim breast-fed babies are intellectually brighter.
sentences.cn: 主流科学家宣称母乳喂养的婴儿更聪明。

sentences.en: Mr Gibson is clearly intellectually out of his depth.
sentences.cn: 吉布森先生显然才智不逮。

sentences.en: Richard was five years younger than him, but no match intellectually or physically for Robert Kincaid.
sentences.cn: 理查德比他小五岁, 但是无论在智力上或是体力上都不是罗伯特.金凯的对手.

sentences.en: She's immature intellectually, but she has a remarkable mature mind in other ways.
sentences.cn: 她在智力上还不成熟, 可是在其它方面她的头脑可异常的成熟.

sentences.en: The child is developing in every way , morally, intellectually and physically.
sentences.cn: 这孩子德 、 智、体样样都好.

sentences.en: They always pick the most intellectually devoid movie on the racks.
sentences.cn: 他们永远都只租架子上那些弱智片.

sentences.en: To the intellectually adventurous and the ambitious it was the gateway to a wider world.
sentences.cn: 对于求知欲和抱负大的人来说,它乃是通向广阔天地的途径.

words.tran_cn: 可理解的；明了的；仅能用智力了解的
智力，理解力；知识分子；思维逻辑领悟力；智力高的人
知识分子；凭理智做事者
智力；情报工作；情报机关；理解力
